### R Tools

-   Dynamic Range Evolution And Diversification model ([DReAD](https://github.com/alexskeels/DynamicRangeEvolutionAndDiversification)): a package for biodiversity simulation

![](pictures/DREAD.png){width="300"}

-   Lineages Through Space and Time in R ([ltstR](https://github.com/alexskeels/ltstR)): a package to visualize spatial and temporal changes in diversity

![](pictures/ltstr.PNG){width="300"}

-   [waRhol](https://github.com/alexskeels/waRhol): a colour palette for R based on the art of Andy Warhol
